sentences.sContent: He was charmed by her vivacity and high spirits.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was charmed by her vivacity and high spirits.
sentences.sCn: 她的活泼与兴高采烈的情绪把他迷住了。

sentences.sContent: We were all affected by the vivacity of this lovely little boy.
sentences.sContent_eng: We were all affected by the vivacity of this lovely little boy.
sentences.sCn: 这个可爱的小男孩的快活使我们都受到感染。

sentences.sContent: "Had I known as much half an hour ago--But since I AM here, "--speakingwith a forced vivacity as he returned to his seat--"what does itsignify?
sentences.sContent_eng: "Had I known as much half an hour ago--But since I AM here, "--speakingwith a forced vivacity as he returned to his seat--"what does itsignify?
sentences.sCn: 鷾“我若是半个小时以前得知这些情况—一可是既然我已经来了”—一他又回到座位上，装作快活的样子说道—一“这又有什么关系呢？

words.tran: 活泼的；快活的；有生气的

trans.tranOther: If you say that someone has vivacity, you mean that they are lively, exciting, and attractive
